rules_text:
When this land enters, sacrifice it. Search your library for a basic Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{3}{W}{U}, Discard Silent Lakefront: Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.
notes:
!tapped
art5

Constant creation and expansion have left some sections of the Weft peaceful, beautiful, and empty.

if uncommon: Silent Lakefront
